summary: removes adrenaline rush (from vendors and dialogue option) but gives skooma the ignore pain effect you love (that lasts longer, too) but don't take too much
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Description[/size]
Removes Adrenaline rush from vendors and the dialogue option.
Adds 15 second ignore pain effect to Skooma (25s on Double-Distilled)

[size=3]How to use[/size]
Just make sure this is below the load order for Deadly combat and you are golden.

[size=3]Reasons I made this mod:[/size]
[list=1][*]I didn't like the buy potion dialogue option.
[/*]
[*]The game has too many potions already.
[/*]
[*]Skooma is completely overlooked.
[/*]
[*]This is a lore-friendly and more immersive effect (dull your pain with the skooma).
[/*]
[/list]
[size=3]Future plans[/size]
[list][*]Visual effect for taking the Skooma
[/*]
[*]Some form of addiction[/*]
[/list]
[size=3]Compability[/size]
Mods that will work and are recommended:
[list][*]Become a Skooma Dealer
[/*]
[*]Skooma Dealers
[/*]
[/list]
Mods that won't crash but will remove effect added:
[list][*]Skyrim Skooma Overhaul
[/*]
[*]Skooma Drug effect (sorry!)
[/*]
[*]Addictive Skooma
[/*]
[*]Chasing the Dragon
[/*]
[/list]
author: mrjentipede

files.name: DC Plugin Skooma - no visual effects
